tswitem.name: Advanced Kickback - Penetrate
tswitem.tooltip:
Advanced Kickback - Penetrate
Gadget (QL 10 Epic)
Character Bound
Kickback: For 20 seconds, whenever you land a penetrating hit you gain
1: 644 Hit Rating
2: 644 Block Rating
3: 712 Critical Rating
4: 644 Critical Power Rating
5: 644 Defence Rating
6: 690 Evade Rating
7: 423 Physical and Magical Protection
8: 644 Penetration Rating
for 4 seconds. Applies a 2 minute cooldown to all Kickbacks.
